name: Microservices Architecture Sprites
description: Comprehensive sprite library for microservices, containers, APIs, and service mesh visualization

containers.name: Containers & Orchestration
containers.description: Docker containers, Kubernetes pods, and orchestration components

docker-container.name: Docker Container
docker-container.description: Standard Docker container with whale logo styling
docker-container.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="80" rx="8" fill="#0db7ed" stroke="#0891b2" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="100" height="60" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><path d="M20 25 h15 v8 h-15 z M40 25 h15 v8 h-15 z M60 25 h15 v8 h-15 z M80 25 h15 v8 h-15 z" fill="#0db7ed"/><path d="M20 40 h15 v8 h-15 z M40 40 h15 v8 h-15 z M60 40 h15 v8 h-15 z M80 40 h15 v8 h-15 z" fill="#0db7ed"/><text x="60" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#0891b2" font-weight="bold">Container</text>

kubernetes-pod.name: Kubernetes Pod
kubernetes-pod.description: Kubernetes pod with distinctive hexagonal styling
kubernetes-pod.svg: <polygon points="60,5 105,25 105,65 60,85 15,65 15,25" fill="#326ce5" stroke="#1e40af" stroke-width="2"/><polygon points="60,15 90,30 90,60 60,75 30,60 30,30" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><circle cx="45" cy="35" r="8" fill="#326ce5"/><circle cx="75" cy="35" r="8" fill="#326ce5"/><circle cx="60" cy="55" r="8" fill="#326ce5"/><text x="60" y="45" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#1e40af" font-weight="bold">Pod</text>

service-mesh.name: Service Mesh
service-mesh.description: Service mesh network visualization with interconnected nodes
service-mesh.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="140" height="100" rx="8" fill="#f3f4f6" stroke="#9ca3af" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/><circle cx="30" cy="30" r="12" fill="#10b981" stroke="#059669" stroke-width="2"/><circle cx="110" cy="30" r="12" fill="#10b981" stroke="#059669" stroke-width="2"/><circle cx="30" cy="70" r="12" fill="#10b981" stroke="#059669" stroke-width="2"/><circle cx="110" cy="70" r="12" fill="#10b981" stroke="#059669" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M42 30 L98 30 M42 70 L98 70 M30 42 L30 58 M110 42 L110 58 M42 38 L98 62 M42 62 L98 38" stroke="#6b7280" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6"/><text x="70" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#374151" font-weight="bold">Mesh</text>

apis.name: APIs & Gateways
apis.description: REST APIs, GraphQL endpoints, API gateways, and communication protocols

rest-api.name: REST API
rest-api.description: RESTful API endpoint with HTTP method indicators
rest-api.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="100" height="70" rx="6" fill="#059669" stroke="#047857" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="84" height="54" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.95"/><text x="50" y="25" text-anchor="middle" font-size="12" fill="#047857" font-weight="bold">REST</text><rect x="15" y="30" width="20" height="12" rx="2" fill="#10b981"/><text x="25" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="white" font-weight="bold">GET</text><rect x="40" y="30" width="20" height="12" rx="2" fill="#f59e0b"/><text x="50" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="white" font-weight="bold">POST</text><rect x="65" y="30" width="20" height="12" rx="2" fill="#ef4444"/><text x="75" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="white" font-weight="bold">DEL</text><text x="50" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#047857">API</text>

graphql.name: GraphQL API
graphql.description: GraphQL API with distinctive pink/purple branding
graphql.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="100" height="70" rx="6" fill="#e11d48" stroke="#be185d" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="84" height="54" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.95"/><polygon points="50,15 58,25 42,25" fill="#e11d48"/><polygon points="35,30 50,40 35,50" fill="#e11d48"/><polygon points="65,30 65,50 50,40" fill="#e11d48"/><polygon points="42,45 58,45 50,55" fill="#e11d48"/><text x="50" y="25" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#be185d" font-weight="bold">GraphQL</text>

api-gateway.name: API Gateway
api-gateway.description: API gateway with routing and load balancing visualization
api-gateway.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="80" rx="8" fill="#7c3aed" stroke="#6d28d9" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="100" height="60" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><rect x="20" y="20" width="80" height="8" rx="4" fill="#a78bfa"/><rect x="20" y="35" width="80" height="8" rx="4" fill="#a78bfa"/><rect x="20" y="50" width="80" height="8" rx="4" fill="#a78bfa"/><circle cx="25" cy="24" r="3" fill="#7c3aed"/><circle cx="25" cy="39" r="3" fill="#7c3aed"/><circle cx="25" cy="54" r="3" fill="#7c3aed"/><path d="M35 24 L85 24 M35 39 L85 39 M35 54 L85 54" stroke="#8b5cf6" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/><text x="60" y="70" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#6d28d9" font-weight="bold">Gateway</text><defs><marker id="arrow" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" refX="9" refY="3" orient="auto"><polygon points="0 0, 10 3, 0 6" fill="#8b5cf6"/></marker></defs>

databases.name: Databases & Storage
databases.description: SQL databases, NoSQL stores, caches, and data persistence layers

sql-database.name: SQL Database
sql-database.description: Traditional SQL database with cylindrical representation
sql-database.svg: <ellipse cx="50" cy="15" rx="40" ry="12" fill="#1f2937" stroke="#374151" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="15" width="80" height="50" fill="#1f2937" stroke="#374151" stroke-width="2"/><ellipse cx="50" cy="65" rx="40" ry="12" fill="#374151" stroke="#4b5563" stroke-width="2"/><ellipse cx="50" cy="30" rx="35" ry="8" fill="#4b5563" opacity="0.7"/><ellipse cx="50" cy="45" rx="35" ry="8" fill="#4b5563" opacity="0.7"/><text x="50" y="52" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold">SQL</text>

nosql-database.name: NoSQL Database
nosql-database.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="8" fill="#065f46" stroke="#047857" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="80" height="60" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><rect x="20" y="20" width="60" height="8" rx="2" fill="#10b981"/><rect x="20" y="35" width="45" height="6" rx="2" fill="#34d399"/><rect x="20" y="45" width="55" height="6" rx="2" fill="#34d399"/><rect x="20" y="55" width="40" height="6" rx="2" fill="#34d399"/><text x="50" y="70" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#047857" font-weight="bold">NoSQL</text>

cache.name: Cache Layer
cache.description: In-memory cache with lightning-fast access indicators
cache.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="100" height="60" rx="6" fill="#dc2626" stroke="#b91c1c" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="84" height="44" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><polygon points="25,20 35,15 35,25" fill="#fbbf24"/><polygon points="45,25 55,20 55,30" fill="#fbbf24"/><polygon points="65,20 75,15 75,25" fill="#fbbf24"/><text x="50" y="42" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#b91c1c" font-weight="bold">CACHE</text>

messaging.name: Messaging & Queues
messaging.description: Message queues, event streams, and asynchronous communication

message-queue.name: Message Queue
message-queue.description: Message queue with envelope icons showing message flow
message-queue.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="70" rx="6" fill="#f59e0b" stroke="#d97706" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="100" height="50" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><rect x="20" y="20" width="15" height="10" rx="2" fill="#f59e0b"/><path d="M20 25 L27.5 30 L35 25" stroke="#d97706" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/><rect x="45" y="20" width="15" height="10" rx="2" fill="#f59e0b"/><path d="M45 25 L52.5 30 L60 25" stroke="#d97706" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/><rect x="70" y="20" width="15" height="10" rx="2" fill="#f59e0b"/><path d="M70 25 L77.5 30 L85 25" stroke="#d97706" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/><path d="M35 25 L45 25 M60 25 L70 25" stroke="#d97706" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#queueArrow)"/><text x="60" y="50" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#d97706" font-weight="bold">Queue</text><defs><marker id="queueArrow" markerWidth="8" markerHeight="8" refX="7" refY="3" orient="auto"><polygon points="0 0, 8 3, 0 6" fill="#d97706"/></marker></defs>

event-stream.name: Event Stream
event-stream.description: Event streaming platform with flowing data visualization
event-stream.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="140" height="60" rx="6" fill="#7c2d12" stroke="#92400e" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="120" height="40" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><path d="M20 25 Q40 15 60 25 T100 25 T120 25" stroke="#ea580c" stroke-width="3" fill="none"/><circle cx="25" cy="25" r="3" fill="#ea580c"/><circle cx="50" cy="22" r="3" fill="#ea580c"/><circle cx="75" cy="28" r="3" fill="#ea580c"/><circle cx="100" cy="25" r="3" fill="#ea580c"/><text x="70" y="45" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#92400e" font-weight="bold">Event Stream</text>
